item.title: Super Rugby 2020 Kicks Off
item.description: The start of the 2020 Super Rugby Season

item.title: How I Added Comments And RSS Features To My Blog
item.description: In this post I explain how I added comments to my blog and also the ability for readers to subscribe using either RSS feeds or with email

item.title: Creating a Dynamic Private NuGet Feed with Authentication
item.description: In this post I explain how I setup a private nuget to host multiple repositories with the ability to authenticate reads and writes to each repository.

item.title: Stop Using Gmail for Work!
item.description: In this post I discuss why you should stop using free email accounts like Gmail for work or professional purposes and instead setup an email account using your own custom domain.

item.title: Setting Up My Raspberry Pi as a VPN Gateway
item.description: In this post I show how I setup my Raspberry Pi as a VPN gateway for my XBOX to connect through so I can buy and play games in the country where I purchased my XBOX.

item.title: Supporting Markdown In InstaBlog
item.description: I've added the ability to write blog entries using Markdown, and it has made a huge difference. It's much easier than writing HTML code. In this post I talk about how I managed to achieve that.

item.title: Migrating a Hg repo to Git
item.description: In this post I go through the steps and process to easily migrate a Hg repository to Git, including the entire commit history

item.title: Open-Sourcing My Web Server Framework
item.description: I decided to open source a project I've been working on for the last 5 or 6 years. It's a .NET platform for building web servers, CMS, etc.

item.title: Similarities Between Tragedy And Luck
item.description: A car accident in the town made me realize people react to other people's fortune and tragedy in a very similar way.

item.title: I'm Looking For A Business Partner
item.description: I am working on a mobile application and platform and I'm looking for someone to join me on this adventure.

item.title: Don't Buy Naked Options
item.description: I believe buying naked options, in trading, is almost never a good idea. And in this post I explain my opinion with a brief Netflix example.
